pkgmetadata.longdescription: Binary Classification Using Extensions of Discriminant Analysis // Implements methods for sample size reduction within Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis in Lapanowski and Gaynanova (2020) arXiv:2005.03858. Also includes methods for non-linear discriminant analysis with simultaneous sparse feature selection in Lapanowski and Gaynanova (2019) PMLR 89:1704-1713.
